jobDescription: Aerotek Scientific is currently seeking an Analytical Separation Scientist. The qualified individual will have experience with separation sciences and methods used for analysis of complex protein samples, including recombinant protein therapeutics and therapeutic protein products.  Qualified candidates are encouraged to email resumes directly to Amy Nguyen.  Analytical Seperation Scientist - Pay Rate - $40-46/hour 6-12 month contract with potential to be hired on permanently Monday - Friday 8AM - 5PM Eligibility of medical benefits on a contributory basis Must have a BS or MS degree in chemistry, biochemistry, biology or related field and 2 - 5 years post-graduation experience in bio-pharmaceutical industry or closely related field Must have experience with protein analysis characterization by capillary electrophoresis Good verbal and written communication skills, meticulous documentations, and possess excellent troubleshooting and interpersonal skills. Key words: capillary electrophoresis, 32 Karat, PA 800 Plus, Empower. Prior experience with Agilent CE - capillary electrophoresis system and familiarity with Waters Empower software is required.  Familiarity with instrumentations, methods development & validation, and system verification's are a plus. The position will require candidate to perform analytical method development using Waters Empower software on PA800Plus CE system and validate various assay performance between Sciex 32Karat software and Empower3 software on the Sciex PA 800Plus system. Ideal candidate will work independently, interact and collaborate with team members in product management, software engineering, system engineering, service and customers.
